name: Rosemary Asparagus Soup
author: Eva Cristina
summary: Quick, easy, and tasty! Creamy asparagus soup with white beans, flavored with rosemary and pepper.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as desired
1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Pour enough olive oil into a skillet to coat the bottom; cook and stir onion, garlic, and rosemary over medium heat just until onion is soft, 5 to 10 minutes
Add butter and flour; cook and stir until butter is melted and flour is dissolved, 3 to 5 minutes
Mix broth, white beans, asparagus, cream, salt, and pepper into onion mixture; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium, cover skillet, and simmer for 10 minutes
Remove skillet from heat and cool for at least 5 minutes
Pour soup into a food processor or blender no more than half full
Cover and pulse a few times before leaving on to blend for about 3 minutes
Pour soup through cheesecloth or strainer
